summary: An incredibly dull-witted family unknowingly stumble upon an illegal weapons deal while on the trail of their "stolen" garbage.
cast: Tom Arnold|Jessica Lundy|Bug Hall|Alex McKenna|Mark Metcalf|Matt Keeslar|Scott Kraft|Victor Ertmanis|Earl Williams|George Chiang|Max Landis|Carol Ng|Arthur Eng|Jennifer Dean|Garry Robbins|Nicu Branzea|Richard Crook|Gurinder Chadha|Mick Garris|Jeremy Ratchford|John Stoneham Jr.|Ken Quinn|Gillian Vanderburgh|Harvey Atkin|David Cronenberg|Markus Parilo|Costa-Gavras|Mif|Walter Alza|Robert Wise|Christopher Lee|Frankie Faison|Mo Kelso|Sherry Miller|Robert Keeshan|Jeff Clarke|Atom Egoyan|Wendy Hopkins|Jacqueline McLeod|Jenny McCarthy|David Ferry|Norman Jewison|Frederic Devancker|Rolonda Watts|Gillo Pontecorvo|Nicholas Rice|Julie Armstrong|Philip Akin|Kevin Conway|Carol Anderson|Rick Avery|Fiona Highet|Phillip Jarrett|Jim Amross|Wayne Ward|Michael Bell|Frank Sicoli|David Sloma|Sean Westlake
title: La familia Stupid
